title: Fatal error is occured when AssertionFailedError is thrown and method covers invalid class
body:
Fatal error have been got when when assertion was failed and test case cover invalid class.

I am using latest version of phpunit

Stack-trace:

PHP Fatal error:  Uncaught exception 'ErrorException' with message 'Catchable Fatal Error: Argument 2 passed to PHPUnit_Framework_TestResult::addFailure() must be an instance of PHPUnit_Framework_AssertionFailedError, instance of PHP_CodeCoverage_Exception_InvalidCoversTarget given, called in /PROJECT-PATH//vendor/phpunit/phpunit/PHPUnit/Framework/TestResult.php on line 717 and defined in /PROJECT-PATH//vendor/phpunit/phpunit/PHPUnit/Framework/TestResult.php line 274' in /PROJECT-PATH//vendor/phpunit/phpunit/PHPUnit/Framework/TestResult.php:274
Stack trace:
#0 /PROJECT-PATH//vendor/phpunit/phpunit/PHPUnit/Framework/TestResult.php(274): Symfony\Component\HttpKernel\Debug\ErrorHandler->handle(4096, 'Argument 2 pass...', '/var-directorie...', 274, Array)
#1 /PROJECT-PATH//vendor/phpunit/phpunit/PHPUnit/Framework/TestRe in /PROJECT-PATH//vendor/phpunit/phpunit/PHPUnit/Framework/TestResult.php on line 274

Fatal error: Uncaught exception 'ErrorException' with message 'Catchable Fatal Error: Argument 2 passed to PHPUnit_Framework_TestResult::addFailure() must be an instance of PHPUnit_Framework_AssertionFailedError, instance of PHP_CodeCoverage_Exception_InvalidCoversTarget given, called in /PROJECT-PATH//vendor/phpunit/phpunit/PHPUnit/Framework/TestResult.php on line 717 and defined in /PROJECT-PATH//vendor/phpunit/phpunit/PHPUnit/Framework/TestResult.php line 274' in /PROJECT-PATH//vendor/phpunit/phpunit/PHPUnit/Framework/TestResult.php on line 274

ErrorException: Catchable Fatal Error: Argument 2 passed to PHPUnit_Framework_TestResult::addFailure() must be an instance of PHPUnit_Framework_AssertionFailedError, instance of PHP_CodeCoverage_Exception_InvalidCoversTarget given, called in /PROJECT-PATH//vendor/phpunit/phpunit/PHPUnit/Framework/TestResult.php on line 717 and defined in /PROJECT-PATH//vendor/phpunit/phpunit/PHPUnit/Framework/TestResult.php line 274 in /PROJECT-PATH//vendor/phpunit/phpunit/PHPUnit/Framework/TestResult.php on line 274

Call Stack:
